attributes.action: Hold a second EU referendum to prevent the break-up of the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Knowing what we now know, we should be allowed to have a second vote, with more specific, properly thought-through victory criteria. If, after that process, we still vote for Brexit - fine.
attributes.background: You get a 14 day cool-off period to decide whether you want to keep or return an online purchase. This is a bit bigger. No-one anticipated that this vote could lead to the break-up of the United Kingdom.   We should be able to reconsider the decision now we are more aware of the consequences.
